Name: Raman
AboutMe:
Raman has over 15 years of business and technology experience including business and functional analysis, systems design, development and implementation, and team leadership. As a Senior Consultant for Deloitte Consulting and later as a private contractor, Raman has assisted large and small organizations with developing and managing the information tools critical to business success. He has extensive knowledge and experience with best practices in software design and development, is a committer for the Scalate project, a partial committer for the Subversion project and has also contributed patches to Git, Akka and other open source projects. His technical expertise includes Java and Scala with a focus on scalability and performance (Akka actors, threading, etc.) modular programming (Spring, OSGi), database design and administration, UNIX system administration, networking, system integration, and cryptography and security. Raman has a Bachelor of Applied Science in Systems Design Engineering with an Option in Management Sciences from the University of Waterloo.

Raman is a principal at VIVO Systems.

SOreadytohelp
